basic_information.scholarship_name: Clifford E. Henderson Memorial Endowed Scholarship-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2015 in memory of the late Cliff Henderson by Iris Henderson, C. Lenny and Paige Henderson and Pamela Gooch. Longtime supporters and audience members, Cliff and Iris enjoyed many performances together by UCO's talented students and faculty. After each performance or show, Cliff often took the time to congratulate "the kids" and comment on how hard they must have worked to be so outstanding. A passionate advocate of education, Cliff's life was enriched by becoming a Friend of the University. His family thought it a fitting tribute to honor his memory with an endowed scholarship that would forever support music students studying at CFAD. Eligibility Musical Theatre Major Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
